data.contentText: Do the following & refer to page 54 COIN, chart B

metadata.title1: 1. Continue Breast Feeding or giving EBM by cup
metadata.title2: 2. Increase frquency of feeds e.g. from 3 to 2 hourly or from 2 to 1 hourly
metadata.title3: 3. Monitor blood glucose before next feed or immediately if any symptoms!

data.title: EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT
